t: Best Cage brand and / or websites to shop for a new cage for my Amazon | Parrot Forum 🦜 Parrot Owners Community
s: The one that looks best to me is on Bird Cages for less and is a Koloa Kavern brand. It's the right dimensions, but the bar spacing is 5/8" for some reason. I know 3/4" - 1" bar spacing is ideal, but I'm not seeing that for this cage size. I suppose that bat spacing should work for an Amazon?

Amazon has patented a system that would put workers in a cage, on top of a robot | The Seattle Times
s: September 8, 2018 - Amazon said it never implemented the technology described in the patent, granted in 2016, and has no plans to.

t: Amazon’s ‘worker cage’ has been dropped, but its staff are not free | André Spicer | The Guardian
s: September 14, 2018 - It sounds like the stuff of science fiction. It’s not. In 2016, Amazon filed a patent for a device described as a “system and method for transporting personnel within an active workplace”. It is actually a cage large enough to fit a worker. It’s mounted on top of an automated trolley device.

t: People are horrified by an Amazon patent that puts workers in cages — but an Amazon exec said even 'bad ideas' get submitted
s: September 14, 2018 - An Amazon patent for a worker transport system inside a caged enclosure filed in 2016 was recently unearthed by a research paper. Amazon has defended its position, saying the cage was designed for worker safety but was never implemented.
